translations.chinese: 得留數月，吾取天下必矣。」
translations.english: If we can hold him back for several months, I will certainly take the world."
Sui He went to persuade Ying Bu, and indeed made him rebel against Chu.

translations.chinese: 五月，漢王屯滎陽，蕭何發關中老弱未傅者悉詣軍。
translations.english: In the fifth month, King Han encamped at Xingyang. Xiao He conscripted all the old and weak in Guanzhong who had not yet been registered and sent them all to the army.

translations.chinese: 韓信亦收兵與漢王會，兵復大振。
translations.english: Han Xin also gathered troops and joined King Han. The army was greatly strengthened again.

translations.chinese: 與楚戰滎陽南京、索間，破之。
translations.english: They fought Chu at Xingyang south of Nanjing and between the Suo River, defeating them.
